name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent v. Travis James GIGOUS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent v. Travis James GIGOUS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of March, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED for reconsideration in light of Commonwealth v. Haag, 981 A.2d 902 (Pa.2009).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
990 A.2d 1147
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent v. Travis James GIGOUS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 16, 2010.
